quality_assessment: Page has several command syntax discrepancies and an incorrect log path, but structure and explanations are generally good

issues.section: How do I view Claude execution logs?
issues.description: Claude JSON log path is incorrect
issues.fix_suggestion: Update path to ~/.claude/projects/ and note that logs are .jsonl files organized by project

issues.section: How do I retry failed DLQ items?
issues.description: DLQ retry command uses incorrect argument names
issues.should_be: The CLI uses 'workflow_id' as the positional argument, not 'job_id'. Also --parallel is correct but default is 10 not shown
issues.fix_suggestion: Clarify that the positional argument is workflow/job ID. Command structure: prodigy dlq retry <workflow_id> [--parallel N]

issues.section: How do I retry failed DLQ items?
issues.description: DLQ list command uses --job-id but CLI shows different flag name
issues.should_be: prodigy dlq list --job-id <job_id> (flag is correct, but should be consistent with retry command terminology)
issues.fix_suggestion: Ensure terminology is consistent between list and retry examples

issues.section: How do I retry failed DLQ items?
issues.description: Missing information about --max-retries and --force flags for DLQ retry
issues.current_content: Only shows basic retry and --parallel flag

issues.section: Why are my MapReduce items not being found?
issues.description: JSONPath test example uses invalid jq syntax
issues.should_be: jq '.items[]' items.json - jq uses different syntax than JSONPath
issues.fix_suggestion: Fix jq command to use correct jq filter syntax: jq '.items[]' items.json
issues.source_reference: jq uses its own filter syntax, not JSONPath

issues.description: Events ls command doesn't show --job-id flag correctly in CLI
issues.should_be: This is correct but could mention more filtering options like --event-type, --agent-id, --since
issues.fix_suggestion: Add note about additional filtering options available

positive_aspects: Good organization with clear question-based headings
Practical debugging steps provided for each issue
Source file references included for some sections
Covers key troubleshooting scenarios users commonly encounter
Examples use code blocks for clarity
improvement_suggestions: Add admonitions (warning, tip, note) using MkDocs Material syntax for important information
Add collapsible sections for longer command examples
Include a 'Common Error Messages' section explaining what specific errors mean
Add links to related CLI help commands (prodigy <command> --help)
Consider adding a troubleshooting flowchart using Mermaid diagrams

metadata.validation_focus: Auto-discovered page - check for drift and enhance with visual features
